title: Impossible to NOT get reported...?
body:
How can I NOT get reported when I play jungle or support?

1. I say nothing and still get blamed or reported by my entire teammates who ALWAYS collude against me.

2. I say nothing offensive and still get blamed or reported by my entire teammates who ALWAYS collude against me.

3. I fully express myself reasonably, justified in this free and democratic society and get blamed or reported by my entire teammates who ALWAYS collude against me.

I was 3/3/10 lee sin spoonfeeding my team all kills and I get blamed more than a 3/5 xerath who DC'd three times giving free kills to the enemy team?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: You dont need to care, because if you did nothing wrong, the reports just go in the garbage bin, and the people reporting you have their report priority/weight lowered.
If you haven't done anything wrong, their report means nothing and will be discarded.
Say Nothing dont speak up to defend your self shield with silence and the almighty mute button
